title: I lost my honor level by changing regions.
body: I moved from EUNE to EUW and I lost my honor level. I had level 4 and now I'm back at level 2. I haven't seen anything that is saying that you're honor level is going back down if you're moving from a region to another. What happened to my account? Am I still getting the rewards from back then?

replies.body: It's explicitly stated in the [Honor FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115008474148) on the Support site that transferring between regions will reset your Honor level back to 2.
hello you are in the oce boards
